name: League of Assassin
description:
The Assassin Alliance is the most dynamic and coolest action game. And match the online RPG game line. Join the Assassin Alliance, allowing you to experience the real arcade fighting.

Assassin's Union's arcade game's inheritance, but a tribute classic. The Assassin Alliance has superb scenes, cool combo and gorgeous special skills. At the same time you can also use equipment and weapons to increase your defense value. Fighting the horizontal version can light your passion, the infinite combination can make your blood pump and exciting! The most exciting fighting game is waiting for you!

The tough monsters are, richer rewards, you can grant, more combo, higher levels; hidden BOSS will give more generous rewards. Then you can kill the monster level up. Demon hunters and demon assassins who fight people who are in the shadow of the power of the background. Can you be a real heroic legend of the demon world? Challenging adventures and excitement to bring you the feeling of excitement!
feature:
● 1: four different assassins give you a different game experience
● 2: endless combination hits make you a super combo master
● 3: classic arcade fighting and exclusive landscape pleasure
● 4: fight to help you revisit the happiness of childhood classic version of the classic.
● 5: each role can be transferred to a more powerful role of freedom.
● 6: pay close attention to mobile data and strive for endless world rankings

World championships and the world ranking system, in addition to endless models are waiting for you to challenge.let with the help of the shadow to bright words.
